name: The President's Cake
description:
I acctually made this game for Weekly Game Jam #108, but it was too late. But whatever, here it is!

The president's birthday cake was stolen and you are an agent of the government sent to a mafia warehouse to rescue the cake. Will you succesfuly complete the mission and save the president's birthday or will you fail and bring chaos upon your country?

This game was made using Gdevelop5. I just did this to experiment with the tool and try to make something work. (It's hard!)

Here are the credits (if I forgot something, please send me a message):

Graphics
Characters by kenney.nl
Crosshair by kenney.nl
Fonts by kenney.nl
Key by BizmasterStudios
Cake by FreeImages.com/Raquel Teixeira
